unnormalised: **EV Charging Scene Heating Up Faster Than Appam on a Tava!**
normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Scene Heating Up Faster Than Appam on a Tava!**

unnormalised: Bangalore - The EV revolution is gathering speed faster than a souped-up auto-rickshaw! Forget range anxiety, folks, because EV charging infrastructure is finally catching up, thanks to a slew of announcements coming out of India.
normalised: Bangalore - The Electric Vehicle revolution is gathering speed faster than a souped-up auto-rickshaw! Forget range anxiety, folks, because Electric Vehicle charging infrastructure is finally catching up, thanks to a slew of announcements coming out of India.

unnormalised: Ola Electric just unveiled plans to roll out a massive hypercharger network across the country, aiming for 10,000 charging points. Think of it - zipping between cities like Chennai and Coimbatore without worrying about being stranded with a dead battery.
normalised: Ola Electric just unveiled plans to roll out a massive hypercharger network across the country, aiming for ten thousand charging points. Think of it - zipping between cities like Chennai and Coimbatore without worrying about being stranded with a dead battery.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power is partnering with local Kirana stores to install smaller, community-based chargers. Imagine grabbing a plate of steaming hot biryani while your Nexon EV gets a quick top-up.
normalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power is partnering with local Kirana stores to install smaller, community-based chargers. Imagine grabbing a plate of steaming hot biryani while your Nexon Electric Vehicle gets a quick top-up.

unnormalised: Experts from IIT Madras are also researching faster and more efficient charging technologies, promising to cut down charging times drastically. Hopefully before the next Onam rush, so everyone can make it home!
normalised: Experts from I I T Madras are also researching faster and more efficient charging technologies, promising to cut down charging times drastically. Hopefully before the next Onam rush, so everyone can make it home!

unnormalised: Plus, the government is offering subsidies and incentives to encourage the adoption of EVs and charging infrastructure.
normalised: Plus, the government is offering subsidies and incentives to encourage the adoption of Electric Vehicles and charging infrastructure.

unnormalised: Rs. 20,000 crore is being invested in this area alone! Expect to see more chargers popping up everywhere, from petrol pumps to shopping malls. The future is electric, and it's looking brighter than Diwali lights!
normalised: Rupees twenty thousand crore is being invested in this area alone! Expect to see more chargers popping up everywhere, from petrol pumps to shopping malls. The future is electric, and it's looking brighter than Diwali lights!
